name: Philosophy Videogame
short_description:
This is a try to build the specifics for a videogame which can teach you philosophy while playing. This way people can have fun AND learn new things about the authors of the past. The aim is to build Aristotle, Platon and all the other philosophers in a role playing game context to incentivate students to learn REAL INFORMATIONS while having fun.
Why this project?
Most videogames are really fun, but you learn names of people and places which do not exist.
We can use the same game-structure to force young guys learn real book contents, real names, real data.
I hope more serious programmers will pursue my aim with better risults.
